page.title: 16People On Village Life.
page.content: In Belchamp walter people feel the character of the village has changed a lot-due to declining population. Many cottages are occupied by 'weekenders' who contribute nothing to the community. There are very few families with young children in the village, the school has closed and there is no playgroup. There are very few opportunities for people from different walks of life to meet, so community life suffers. In Belchamp Otten however attitudes are different because there are few 'weekenders', most families are middle aged and there are more young children. Belchamp otten is also much nearer to Belchamp St Pauls with a good connecting footpath so they join in more things in St Pauls. There is a goodwill feeling towards the church though many don't attend.
